placementDate.description: The date the order was placed. Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

isFavorite.description: Indicates if the user has favorited this order or not.

name.description: A name the user has assigned to this order.

note.description: A note the user has added to this order.

requestedKegReturn.description: An indicator that the user would like to return kegs.

orderState.description: A status used to indicate the current step at which an order is at.

orderProgress.description: A percentage based number ranging from 0 to 100 indicating the progress of the order and how close to completion it is.

physicalInvoiceID.description: An id of an invoice reviewed by a government resource.

pricing.description: An encapsulation of the pricing details associated with this order.

cost.description: The final cost of the order after taxes, charges, and discounts have been applied.

taxAmount.description: The total tax charged to the order.

chargeAmount.description: The total cost of charges to the order, excluding tax.

grossSalesAmount.description: The total cost of the order, excluding deposits, taxes, and other charges.

depositAmount.description: The cost of deposits paid when purchasing cans, bottles, and kegs.

itemIDs.description: An array of itemIDs that describe which items this discount is associated with.

type.description: Specify AO, PO, CF. AO = Amount off, PO = Percent Off, CF = Credit Free.

earnLevelAmount.description: The amount that must be spent to earn a discount

earnLevelQuantity.description: The number of items that must be purchased to earn a discount

earnedItem.description: The item earned by a CF type discount

discountAmount.description: The total value of the discount.

pointsEarned.description: The total number of points earned when that order was placed.

orderID.description: The ID of the associated order.

invoiceID.description: The ID of the associated invoice.

itemID.description: The ID of the associated item. Note, either item or itemID is required.

merchandiseID.description: The ID of the associated merchandise.

item.description: The associated item. Note, either item or itemID is required.

pricingCondition.description: The condition by which this object was priced.
